intelligence.target_persona: Local owners of nice cars who want a premium finish without wasting time

brand.name: Biff-Buff Detailing
brand.tagline: Premium Mobile Car Detailing at Your Doorstep

hero.headline: Bring Showroom Shine to Your Car Without Leaving Home
hero.subtext: Expert mobile detailing that fits your busy schedule and delivers a flawless finish every time.

image.image_search_query: premium mobile car detailing service outdoors

about.story_text: Biff-Buff Detailing was founded to bring professional, high-quality car care directly to your doorstep. We understand that your time is valuable and your car deserves the best treatment without the hassle of traditional detailing shops.
about.founder_note: As a car enthusiast, I wanted to create a service that combines convenience with exceptional quality. Every vehicle we touch receives the utmost care and attention.

features.title: Convenient Mobile Service
features.description: We come to your home or office, saving you time and effort.

features.title: Premium Quality Finish
features.description: Using top-tier products and techniques to ensure a flawless shine.

features.title: Eco-Friendly Products
features.description: Safe for your car and the environment with biodegradable cleaning agents.

features.title: Flexible Scheduling
features.description: Book appointments that fit your busy lifestyle, including weekends.

features.title: Experienced Detailers
features.description: Skilled professionals dedicated to meticulous care and customer satisfaction.

contact.headline: Ready for Your Carâ€™s Ultimate Shine?
contact.subheadline: Contact Biff-Buff Detailing today to schedule your premium mobile service.

service_area.travel_note: We proudly serve Philadelphia and nearby communities within a 30-mile radius.

processSteps.title: Schedule Your Appointment
processSteps.description: Choose a time and place that works best for you through our easy booking system.

processSteps.title: We Come to You
processSteps.description: Our professional detailers arrive fully equipped at your location.

processSteps.title: Detailed Cleaning & Polishing
processSteps.description: We meticulously clean, polish, and protect every inch of your vehicle.

processSteps.title: Final Inspection & Customer Approval
processSteps.description: We review the results with you to ensure complete satisfaction.

faqs.question: What areas do you serve?
faqs.answer: We serve Philadelphia and surrounding communities within approximately 30 miles.

faqs.question: How long does a typical detailing take?
faqs.answer: Most services take between 1.5 to 3 hours depending on the package and vehicle size.

faqs.question: Are your cleaning products safe for my car and the environment?
faqs.answer: Yes, we use eco-friendly, biodegradable products that are safe for your vehicle and the planet.

faqs.question: Can I schedule a detailing at my office?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We offer mobile detailing at homes, offices, or any convenient location.

items.title: Exterior Hand Wash
items.caption: Gentle yet thorough cleaning for a spotless finish.

items.title: Interior Vacuuming
items.caption: Deep cleaning to remove dust and debris from every corner.

items.title: Paint Polishing
items.caption: Restoring shine and removing minor imperfections.

items.title: Wheel and Tire Care
items.caption: Detailed cleaning and dressing for a showroom look.
